entities.name: Cognitive Trust
entities.context: Competence-based. You can do the thing you say you'll do.

entities.name: Affective Trust
entities.context: Care-based. You'll do the right thing. You care about me.

entities.name: Psychological Safety
entities.context: Psychological safety is a group norm: Will the group punish me for mistakes, vulnerability, or risk-taking?

entities.name: False Self
entities.context: We create a 'false self' to maintain relationships by suppressing authentic needs
